About me

A little about me

Hi, I am Akbar, a CS student, a full stack web developer and UI/UX designer from Seoul, South Korea. I love making dynamic apps for the web and exploring new technologies.
From technical standpoint, I mainly use JavaScript and Python for development and have become pretty good at them.
For the past two years I have worked with wide range of development tools and frameworks, outside of school curriculum. I mosty make use of Django, Node.js and React.js.
I can help you in all sorts of web development related tasks in your project from UI/UX design to designing database schemas and APIs.
If you have anything to ask, shoot me an email or find me on Twitter. See my resume for more specific information about me.
